vendor.translation[0].definitions[0].def: someone who sells things, especially on the street
vendor.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: He bought a copy from a newspaper vendor.
vendor.translation[1].definitions[0].def: someone who is selling something, especially a house or a piece of land
vendor.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: House sales could dry up as vendors refuse to accept drastic price cuts.
